choices: She tortures you with her feet.

1.content:
Jack has a massive crush on his babysitter Aubrey who looks after because Jacks mother is away a lot on business.

This time you Mother is away on a long business trip and hires Aubrey to look after you.

One day Jack sees Aubrey sitting on the couch watching TV with her barefoot on the table (you have a foot fetish).

Jack walks up to Aubrey and says “Hey Aubrey can I give you a foot massage”

Aubrey looks surprised and gives a flattering smile “okay I guess” said her

Jack sits on the Sofa and Aubrey puts her feet on his lap, As Jack gives a foot massage Aubrey sees how Jack is clearly obsessing over her feet.

Aubrey then feels something growing under Jack tight jeans. He is getting an erection, Aubrey is furious but pretends not to notice it.

Aubrey then decides to punish Jack by doing something horrible, She snaps her fingers and flash, Jack wakes up in a strange environment and sees a giant Aubrey looking down at him and realises that he is 1inch tall. “Hey little perv I’m gonna have fun with you” in her booming voice.
1.title: Aubrey Shrinks You

info.brief_description: You get shrunk by your magic but cruel babysitter. PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are Jack, a 12 year old boy who gets a babysitter, who is Aubrey (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm2201555/mediaviewer/rm1476887809) yes that Aubrey. She is a beautiful but crazy women who has a magic power to shrink people

RULES:
1). Mainly Focus On Giantess Aubrey
2). Anything Sexually Goes (Go Crazy)
3). If There Is A Boyfriend Or Girlfriend Don’s Have Them Solo
4). Keep Him Small And Keep Aubrey Normal Sized
5). You Can Shrink Other Characters (But Not Too Many)
6). You Can’s Kill Jack
